response.original_title: The first time I saw the earth move
response.overview: When the world stops, her thoughts start to overflow.  A strange virus has changed everything, and nothing feels safe anymore. Through voice notes sent to a close friend, a young woman tries to understand what's happening around her — and inside her.
response.tagline: When the world changes, her thoughts start to overflow.
response.title: La primera vez que ví a la tierra moverse
